title: API Latency Issues
description: Users are experiencing high response times when accessing the API.

timeline.content: Users have reported slow response times when making API requests, affecting various endpoints.
The engineering team is investigating the root cause of the API latency. Initial assessments suggest possible database query inefficiencies.

title: Website Downtime
description: Users are unable to access the website due to a server crash.

timeline.content: Multiple users reported being unable to load the website, receiving a '503 Service Unavailable' error. Our team is assessing the issue.

title: CDN Performance Degradation
description: Some users are experiencing slow content delivery due to CDN issues.

timeline.content: Users reported slow loading times for assets and images due to CDN delays.
Our network team is investigating potential latency issues in the CDN service.
The issue has been identified as a regional network congestion problem affecting CDN traffic.
Mitigation measures have been applied, and performance is improving. The team is monitoring for further anomalies.

title: Email Notifications Outage
description: Emails are not being delivered due to an issue with the email service provider.

timeline.content: Users reported that they are not receiving email notifications for password resets and account verifications.
The engineering team is diagnosing the email delivery failures.
Issue traced to a misconfiguration in our email provider's API. A fix is being implemented.
Email delivery is restored. We are monitoring system performance.
The email notification service is fully operational. Incident resolved.
